item.description:
SALSA & TANGO CLASS I

Make your New Years resolution come true by enrolling in this dance class. Tired of sitting and watching others dance and have fun at parties and weddings? Then come learn the basics and you’ll look great. Steps covered: Salsa on 1, with under arm turns, cross body lead, and arm checks. Tango has a style all it’s own with dramatic poses and sharp steps.

Ballroom dancing is fun, great exercise and very sociable.
This one hour class is for all levels, beginners welcome.
Partners are suggested so ask a friend. Please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can slide, no sandals. Class size is limited to 30.

Instructor: Laurent Mullen, owner of Ballroom Dancin Fools, teaching Wedding Couples and ballroom dance since 1998 is a Pro-Am competitor in American Smooth and Rhythm & Theater Arts and is co-founder of Connecticut Ballroom Theatre, LLC.
For more information visit www.BallroomDancinFools.vpweb.com


Thursdays, 7:15-8:15pm
5 weeks: Winter 2010
Fee: $50/person
$85/couple
item.name: Salsa & Tango class
